node.statement: L2 PYTHAGORAS DECOMPOSITION: Since h = u - alpha, we have ||u||^2 = ||h||^2 + 2<h,alpha> + ||alpha||^2, so Phi_n(p) = Phi_n(r) + 2<h,alpha> + ||alpha||^2. Define J_p = Phi_n(p) - Phi_n(r) = 2<h,alpha> + ||alpha||^2 >= 0 (Fisher decrease). Similarly J_q = Phi_n(q) - Phi_n(r) = 2<h,beta> + ||beta||^2 >= 0. The target harmonic mean inequality is equivalent to J_p * J_q >= Phi_n(r)^2 = ||h||^4.
